thread.title: Week 7: Operation Sports Fantasy Football Championship on FanDuel
thread.title_full: Week 7: Operation Sports Fantasy Football Championship on FanDuel

author: Steve_OS
title: Week 7: Operation Sports Fantasy Football Championship on FanDuel
text: Week 7: Operation Sports Fantasy Football Championship on FanDuel 10:34 AM - October 21, 2015 by Steve_OS Week 6 of the NFL season is now in the rearview, but luckily we have 14 games in Week 7 to wet our football appetites. Before we recap the winning lineup from Week 6 of The Operation Sports FanDuel Championship , heres what you need to know about Week 6: The contest costs $5 to play and pays $100 to first place. Click here to enter! We'll see you there! Now, what do DeAndre Hopkins, Philip Rivers and LeGarrette Blount all have in common? All three players Week 6 performance landed them in the winning lineup of the Operation Sports Championship. The winning lineup from Week 6, submitted by wwharton , received nearly half of its points, 82.82 of 168.02, from the trio of Hopkins, Rivers and Blount. Kind of sounds like a law firm, right? In second place this week, following up his first place finish in Week 5, is bmore_irish , who ended Week 6 with 162.62 points. A hearty congratulations to wwharton and bmore_irish for finishing atop the field in the Operation Sports FanDuel Championship! Don't miss out on the Week 7 contest , as the opportunities to qualify for the Operation Sports Championship in Week 11 are dwindling. Heres a look at wwharton winning lineup:
